mapper.select: SELECT buyerCode, buyerName, address, country, businessNumber, phone, deliveryCompany, manager FROM Buyer
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Buyer (buyerCode, buyerName, address, country, businessNumber, phone, deliveryCompany, manager) VALUES (#{buyerCode}, #{buyerName}, #{address}, #{country}, #{businessNumber}, #{phone}, #{deliveryCompany}, #{manager})
mapper.update: UPDATE Buyer SET buyerName = #{buyerName}, address = #{address}, country = #{country}, businessNumber = #{businessNumber}, phone = #{phone}, deliveryCompany = #{deliveryCompany}, manager = #{manager} WHERE buyerCode = #{buyerCode}
